wikipedia_page.main: Leslie Allman (26 May 1902 – 21 March 1979) was a footballer. Allman, a goalkeeper spent the majority of his career in non-league football, but made 15 professional appearances for Norwich City from 1926 to 1928.

response: * 21 March 1979 - Leslie Allman, 76, made his 15 Football League appearances as a goalkeeper for Norwich City in the late 1920s, spending the rest of his career at non-league level.
